channel.title: CVE Feed for LINE Corporation -- LINE for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LINE Corporation -- LINE for Android

item.title: CVE-2015-0897|2024-08-06T04:26:11.396Z -- line%20corporation -- line%20for%20android
item.description: LINE for Android version 5.0.2 and earlier and LINE for iOS version 5.0.0 and earlier are vulnerable to MITM (man-in-the-middle) attack since the application allows non-SSL/TLS communications. As a result, any API may be invoked from a script injected by a MITM (man-in-the-middle) attacker.
